clue.en: (used only with indefinite or interrogative pronouns) Other; in addition to previously mentioned items.
clue.zh: （仅与不定代词或疑问代词一起使用）其他；除了前面提到的项目之外。

clue.en: A large quantity or number; a great deal.
A place where items may be accumulated or routinely kept.
clue.zh: 可以积累或定期保存物品的地方。

clue.en: The rising motion of water as a wave passes; a surge; the upward angular displacement of a vessel, opposed to pitch, the correlative downward movement.
clue.zh: 当波浪经过时水的上升运动；激增；船舶的向上角位移，与俯仰相反，即相关的向下运动。
